abilities.name: Litanies of the Devout
abilities.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains a Chaplain Grimaldus model, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Temple Relics
abilities.description:
In your Command phase, if this unit contains one or more Cenobyte Servitor models, select one Temple Relics ability (see left). Until the start of your next Command phase, this unit’s Chaplain Grimaldus model has that ability.


Banner of the Emperor Victorious: Add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls for this unit


Column of the Major Alter: Add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of models in this unit


Water from the Stoup of Elucidation: Improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in this unit by 1.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This unit can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Infernus Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren

weapons.name: ➤ Sword of the High Marshals - Sweep
➤ Sword of the High Marshals - Strike

abilities.name: Crusade of Wrath
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.

abilities.name: High Marshal
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6, adding 1 to the result for every five models in this model's unit: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren

abilities.name: Righteous Zeal
abilities.description: In your opponent's Shooting phase, each time an enemy unit has shot, if any models from this unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, this unit can make a Righteous Zeal move. To do so, roll one D6 and add 2 to the result: models in this unit move a number of inches up to this result, but this unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding ^^**Aircraft^^**). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. This unit cannot make a Righteous Zeal move while it is Battle-shocked or within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, and can only make one Righteous Zeal move per phase.

abilities.name: Exploit Their Cowardice
abilities.description: Each time an enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit is selected to Fall Back, after it ends that Fall Back move, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, this unit can make a Normal move.

abilities.name: Armour of Faith
abilities.description: Once per phase, when an attack is allocated to this model and the saving throw is failed, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Sigismund's Heir
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit declares a charge, if one or more targets of that charge have the CHARACTER keyword, add 2 to the Charge roll. Once per battle, when this model's unit is selected to fight, if that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy CHARACTER units, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren
■ Sternguard Veteran Squad

abilities.name: Chosen of the Emperor
abilities.description: You cannot include more than one **^^Emperor's Champion^^** model in your army.

abilities.name: Aquilon Optics
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll, you can re-roll one Wound roll and you can re-roll one Damage roll when resolving its attacks

abilities.name: Rotating Death
abilities.description: This model’s twin heavy onslaught gatling cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability when targeting Infantry units.

abilities.name: Ferocious Assault
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack with its twin las-talon that targets the closest eligible Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 7 TACTICUS or PHOBOS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models.

abilities.name: Assault Vehicle
abilities.description: Units can disembark from this Transport after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge that turn.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 14 ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY models. Each JUMP PACK, GRAVIS or TERMINATOR model takes up the space of 2 models and each CENTURION model takes up the space of 3 models.

abilities.name: Stabilised Disembarkation
abilities.description: In your opponent's Shooting phase, each time and enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has shot, if any of those attacks targeted this TRANSPORT, it can use this ability. If it does, any units embarked within it can disembark. When doing so, models in those units can be set up wholly within 6" of this TRANSPORT and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 7 Adeptus Astartes Infantry models. Each Jump Pack, Wulfen, Gravis or Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models and each Centurion model takes up the space of 3 models.

abilities.name: Interception Strike
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is within 12" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Infernus Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren
■ Sternguard Veteran Squad

abilities.name: Inspirational Exemplar
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Pious Fervour
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit is selected to fight, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's Master-Crafted Power Weapon for each enemy unit within 6" of this model (to a maximum of +3)

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Infernus Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren
■ Sternguard Veteran Squad

You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Captain or Chapter Master model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

abilities.name: Vehement Aggression
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit is selected to fight, take a Leadership test for that unit: if passed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll; if failed, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1

abilities.name: Prioritised Eradication
abilities.description: Each time a model in this model's unit makes a melee attack that destroys one or more enemy units, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 CP

abilities.name: Righteous Zeal
abilities.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

choices.name: Twin Lightning Claws + Close combat weapon

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren

abilities.name: Remorseless Persecution
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced

abilities.name: Condemnatory Annihilation
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit has fought, if one or more enemy units were destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test

abilities.name: Vengeful Exhortation
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play, the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Martial Honour
abilities.description: The first time a model in this model's unit makes a melee attack that destroys one or more enemy units, until the end of the battle, while this model's unit is not Battle-shocked, add 5 to this model's Objective Control characteristic.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:


■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren Squad


You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Captain, Chapter Master, Execrator or Lieutenant model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

abilities.name: Teleport Homer
abilities.description: At the start of the battle, you can set up one Teleport Homer token for this unit anywhere on the battlefield that is not in your opponent’s deployment zone. If you do, once per battle, you can target this unit with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP, but when resolving that Stratagem, you must set this unit up within 3" horizontally of that token and not within 9" horizontally of any enemy models. That token is then removed.

abilities.name: Judgement of the Weak
abilities.description: Each time an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) within engagement range of this unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 16 Adeptus Astartes Infantry models. Each Jump Pack, Wulfen, Gravis or Terminator model takes up the space of 2 models and each Centurion model takes up the space of 3 models.

abilities.name: Assault Ramp
abilities.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Legacy of Jerulas
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and a re-roll a Wound roll of 1

abilities.name: Vitruous Onslaught
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

choices.name: Sternguard Bolt Pistol + Sternguard Bolt Rifle + Close combat weapon
Sternguard Bolt Pistol + Combi-weapon + Close combat weapon
Sternguard Bolt Pistol + Terminator Honours upgrade + Close combat weapon
Sternguard Bolt Pistol + Close combat weapon

abilities.name: Armour of Faith
abilities.description: Once per phase, when an attack is allocated to this model and the saving throw is failed, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Sigismund's Heir
abilities.description: Each time this model's unit declares a charge, if one or more targets of that charge have the CHARACTER keyword, add 2 to the Charge roll. Once per battle, when this model's unit is selected to fight, if that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy CHARACTER units, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description:
This model can be attached to the following units:

■ Assault Intercessor Squad
■ Intercessor Squad
■ Crusader Squad
■ Sword Brethren
■ Sternguard Veteran Squad

abilities.name: Chosen of the Emperor
abilities.description: You cannot include more than one **^^Emperor's Champion^^** model in your army.

templar_vows.name: Templar Vows
templar_vows.description: At the start of the battle, select one Templar Vow to be active for your army. It replaces the Oath of Moment army rule.

choices.name: Suffer Not the Unclean to Live
choices.effect: Melee weapons equipped by models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

choices.name: Uphold the Honour of the Emperor
choices.effect: Models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability and a Leadership characteristic of 5+.

choices.name: Abhor the Witch, Destroy the Witch
choices.effect: Models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save against Psychic Attacks, and melee weapons have the [ANTI-PSYKER 4+] ability.

choices.name: Accept Any Challenge, No Matter the Odds
choices.effect: Melee weapons equipped by models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

rules.name: Templar Vows
rules.description: At the start of the battle, select one Templar Vow. That vow is active for all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army for the entire battle.

choices.name: Suffer Not the Unclean to Live
choices.effect: Melee weapons equipped by models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

choices.name: Uphold the Honour of the Emperor
choices.effect: Models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability and a Leadership characteristic of 5+.

choices.name: Abhor the Witch, Destroy the Witch
choices.effect: Models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save against Psychic Attacks, and melee weapons have the [ANTI-PSYKER 4+] ability.

choices.name: Accept Any Challenge, No Matter the Odds
choices.effect: Melee weapons equipped by models in ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

stratagems.name: Fervent Acclamation
stratagems.description: Use at the start of any phase. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army. Until the end of the turn, that CHARACTER's unit benefits from one additional Templar Vow of your choice (in addition to the one selected at the start of the battle).

stratagems.name: Righteous Zeal
stratagems.description: Use in your Movement phase, when a BLACK TEMPLARS INFANTRY unit from your army makes a Normal move or Advance move. That unit can move an additional D6" (this is not an Advance).

stratagems.name: Devout Push
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase, after a BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army has fought. That unit can make a Normal move of up to 3", but must end that move closer to the nearest enemy unit or nearest objective marker.

stratagems.name: Suffer Not the Unclean to Live
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase, when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army is selected to fight. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, improve the AP of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Tangible Hatred
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase, when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn is selected to fight. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: No Escape
stratagems.description: Use in your opponent's Movement phase, when an enemy unit within Engagement Range of a BLACK TEMPLARS unit Falls Back. Roll a D6 for each model in that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

enhancements.name: Perdition's Edge
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS model only. Add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the bearer.

enhancements.name: Tannhauser's Bones
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS model only. The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save. Each time the bearer is destroyed, roll a D6: on a 2+, the bearer is not destroyed and 1 wound remains.

enhancements.name: Sigismund's Seal
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Weapon Skill characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. Each time the bearer makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

enhancements.name: Witchseeker Bolts
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS model only. Improve the AP of ranged weapons equipped by the bearer by 1. Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack against a PSYKER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

rules.name: Crusade of Wrath
rules.description: Each time a BLACK TEMPLARS model from your army makes a melee attack, if that model's unit made a Charge move this turn, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack. In addition, BLACK TEMPLARS units from your army can Advance and Charge in the same turn.

stratagems.name: Zealous Fury
stratagems.description: Use in your Charge phase. Select one BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army. That unit can re-roll Charge rolls this phase.

stratagems.name: Wrathful Devotion
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase, when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit is selected to fight. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit until the end of the phase.

stratagems.name: Shock Assault
stratagems.description: Use in the Fight phase, when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit that charged this turn is selected to fight. Until the end of the phase, improve the AP of melee attacks by 1.

stratagems.name: Righteous Smiting
stratagems.description: Use when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase. That BLACK TEMPLARS unit can make a D6" move toward the nearest enemy unit. If it ends within Engagement Range, it can fight again.

stratagems.name: Vow of Retribution
stratagems.description: Use when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army is destroyed by a melee attack. Select one friendly BLACK TEMPLARS unit within 6" of the destroyed unit. That unit can fight as if it were the Fight phase.

stratagems.name: Relentless Advance
stratagems.description: Use in your Movement phase. Select one BLACK TEMPLARS INFANTRY unit. That unit can Advance without rolling — add 6" to its Move characteristic instead.

enhancements.name: Paragon of Fury
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. Add 2 to the Strength and 1 to the Damage characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons when the bearer's unit made a Charge move this turn.

enhancements.name: Epitome of Piety
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. Once per battle, the bearer can regain up to D3+3 lost wounds.

enhancements.name: Champion of the Crusade
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. The bearer gains the Scouts 6" ability. In addition, the bearer's unit can charge even if it Advanced this turn.

enhancements.name: Oathsworn Determination
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit would lose a wound, roll a D6: on a 6, that wound is not lost.

rules.name: Holy Vindication
rules.description: Each time a BLACK TEMPLARS model from your army makes an attack while its unit is within range of an objective marker, re-roll Hit rolls of 1. If the attacker's unit is also Below Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.name: Eternal Vigil
stratagems.description: Use when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit within range of an objective marker is targeted. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made against that unit, worsen the AP by 1.

stratagems.name: Sacred Ground
stratagems.description: Use in your Movement phase. Select one BLACK TEMPLARS unit. Until the end of the turn, that unit counts as being within range of an objective marker for the purposes of the detachment rule.

stratagems.name: Hold the Line
stratagems.description: Use when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit within range of an objective marker is selected to fight. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, improve the AP by 1.

stratagems.name: Bring It Down
stratagems.description: Use in your Shooting phase. Select one BLACK TEMPLARS unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack against a unit within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Unyielding Faith
stratagems.description: Use when a BLACK TEMPLARS unit from your army fails a Battle-shock test. That unit is treated as having passed the test instead.

stratagems.name: Oathsworn to the Emperor
stratagems.description: Use at the start of your Command phase. Select one BLACK TEMPLARS unit within range of an objective marker. Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the OC characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Banner of the Crusade
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS ANCIENT model only. While the bearer is within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the OC characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

enhancements.name: Aegis of the Emperor
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. The bearer has a 5+ invulnerable save. While within range of an objective marker, the bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save instead.

enhancements.name: Crusader's Helm
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. While the bearer is within range of an objective marker, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for enemy units that declare a charge against the bearer's unit.

enhancements.name: Orb of the Emperor's Aegis
enhancements.description: BLACK TEMPLARS CHARACTER model only. Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, you can remove the bearer's unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set up the unit anywhere on the battlefield within range of an objective marker and more than 9" from all enemy models.

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

weaponKeywords.Heavy: Add 1 to Hit rolls if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this phase.
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire X: Each time the bearer shoots, increase attacks by X if target is within half range.
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can be shot even if the unit is within Engagement Range of enemy units.
weaponKeywords.Blast: Add 1 attack per 5 models in target unit.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits X: Critical hits generate X additional hits.
weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic.
weaponKeywords.Melta X: If target is within half range, increase Damage by X.
weaponKeywords.Anti-X Y+: Improve AP by 1 and wound on Y+ against targets with keyword X.
weaponKeywords.Precision: On wound roll of 6, allocate to CHARACTER in Attached unit.
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving, roll D6: on 1, suffer 3 mortal wounds or destroyed.
weaponKeywords.Ignores Cover: Target does not receive Benefit of Cover.
weaponKeywords.Lance: Add 1 to Wound rolls if the bearer's unit charged this turn.
weaponKeywords.Torrent: Automatically hits — do not make Hit rolls.

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: Add 1 to Hit rolls if bearer Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: Increase attacks by X if target is within half range.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: Add 1 attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits generate X additional hits.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage.

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: Increase Damage by X if target is within half range.

weapon.name: Anti-X Y+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on Y+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On wound roll of 6, allocate to CHARACTER in Attached unit.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving, roll D6: on 1, suffer 3 mortal wounds or destroyed.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not receive Benefit of Cover.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: Add 1 to Wound rolls if bearer charged this turn.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: A leader model that can be attached to eligible units.

unit.name: Epic Hero
unit.description: A named character. Only one per army. Cannot take Enhancements.

unit.name: Fly
unit.description: Can move over models and terrain.

unit.name: Deep Strike
unit.description: Can be set up in Reserves and arrive from Reinforcements.

unit.name: Infiltrators
unit.description: Can set up anywhere more than 9" from enemy models.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Can make a Normal move of up to X" before the first turn.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to eligible Bodyguard units.
